Yog's Heart

Description

Yog's Heart is one of the four Yog-Dzewa organs that appear during the final boss fight against Yog-Dzewa. It represents the heart of the ancient chaos god and is a formidable opponent with powerful abilities.

Stats

* HP: 450 * HT: 450 * Defense Skill: 40 * Attack Skill: 26 * Damage: 35-45 * DR (Damage Reduction): 22 * EXP for Kill: 12 * Level: Guts level (26-30)

Special Abilities

* Beckoning: When damaged, calls all other mobs on the level to its location * Larva Summoning: When defending against attacks, has a chance to spawn a Larva on a nearby cell * Healing: Each turn, has a chance to heal another random mob on the level by 20% of its max HP * Immunities: Immune to Toxic Gas, Paralysis, Amok, Sleep, Terror, and Burning

Behavior

* Spawns at the beginning of the Yog-Dzewa fight along with 2-3 other Yog organs * Actively moves to engage the player * Works in coordination with other Yog organs (Yog's Brain, Yog's Eye, Yog's Teeth, Rotting Fist, Burning Fist)

Drops

* Drops various valuable items upon defeat (specific drops determined by game mechanics)

Strategy

* Should be prioritized as a target due to its healing ability * The beckoning effect can quickly overwhelm players, so it's best to isolate it if possible * The spawning of Larva can create additional threats during the fight * Use area-effect abilities carefully as they might affect other Yog organs as well

Java Class

* Java Class: YogsHeart.java

Related

* Yog-Dzewa - The main boss of the Guts level * Yog's Brain - Another Yog organ * Yog's Eye - Another Yog organ * Yog's Teeth - Another Yog organ * Rotting Fist - Another Yog organ * Burning Fist - Another Yog organ
